problem_text: If \triangle S R Y \sim \triangle W X Q, R T is an altitude of \triangle S R Y, X V is an altitude of \triangle W X Q, R T = 5, R Q = 4, Q Y = 6, and Y X = 2, find X V.
compact_text: If \triangle SRY \sim \triangle WXQ, RT is an altitude of \triangle SRY, XV is an altitude of \triangle WXQ, RT = 5, RQ = 4, QY = 6, and YX = 2, find XV.
annotat_text: If $\triangle SRY \sim \triangle WXQ, \overline{RT} $ is an altitude of $\triangle SRY$, $\overline{XV}$ is an altitude of $\triangle WXQ, RT=5, RQ=4, QY=6$, and $Y X=2,$ find $XV$.
